item.title: Matrix Rain (P5-JS)
item.description: A small matrix rain demo using p5.js Demo

item.title: nerodenney(dot)com v2
item.description: Created using the Jekyll static site software so I could utilise the free hosting found on GitHub-Pages.

item.title: Hyper Terminal Theme
item.description: Hyper Terminal Theme (HYPER-DARK-VIBRANCY) A dark demo theme for Hyper Terminal to showoff the new vibrancy effect on macOS only. View on GitHub Download on NPM npm i hyper-dark-vibrancy

item.title: Contact
item.description: For enquiries please contact below Brighton, UK

item.title: About
item.description: I am a web developer with a passion for front end design. Services I Offer Wix sites managed WordPress blogging platforms Self-hosted or fully managed web sites Responsive web design Wire framing Rapid prototyping Want the ability to manage and update your blog? I can build it then hand over the control to you. Don’t want that headache? I can host and manage the site for you, leave all the techie bits to me.

item.title: Base64 Converter Progressive WebApp
item.description: A utility to encode/decode strings and files into base64. This is a remake of my Chrome app due to Google ending support for Chrome apps. I used progressive techniques including offline mode so this web app can function much more like a traditional mobile app. Try Me

item.title: slack-spin slack bot
item.description: A chatbot for slack that randomly picks a person (to make tea?) written in NodeJS View on GitHub

item.title: GIS Viewer Concept
item.description: A proof of concept GIS viewer built in AngularJS and OpenLayers3. This project was to test out the capabilities of the OpenLayers3 framework and includes the ability to have multiple mapping layers, draw shapes and a postcode search. View on GitHub

item.title: Base64 Converter Chrome App
item.description: An app I made for the Chrome App store that can convert text and files to and from base64 encoded strings. I made this app for my own use as I found myself needing this functionality a lot within some other projects I was working on. I like the idea of Chrome Apps and noticed there was not a simple easy to use app like this in the store already.

item.title: Destructeev - One time read messages
item.description: Built using the MEAN stack; NodeJs, AngularJs, express and MongoDb this application is used to create one time read messages. Once a message has been created the writer gets a link he/she can send to another party which gives them a one time view of the contents before deletion. View on GitHub

item.title: Groundsure GIS Ordering Platform
item.description: I helped design and develop a GIS based ordering platform for environmental reports used during land and property acquisition. This project involved heavy use of the ESRI mapping framework and Microsoft’s TypeScript project. As this is a commercial application I cannot go into too much detail regarding specific implementation or environmental details about this project. View Marketing Site

item.title: PDF Compressor Web Api
item.description: This is a web service that can compress pdf files using the iTextSharp library. I created this as a web service so it could easily be used by many systems/people. View on GitHub

item.title: nerodenney(dot)com v1
item.description: v1.0 of the site you are on right now!
